title: Compliance with boil water advice following a water contamination incident in the Netherlands in 2007.pdf
cause: run-off of rainwater contaminated  with faeces of breeding gulls
mitigation: boil tap water for two minutes before consumption
broadcasted through  mass-media including the national and regional television channel,  radio and newspapers
public website used during  emergency situations (www.crisis.nl) and a toll-free telephone  number were made available for the public
